nodes.speaker: Supervisor
nodes.subtitle: Are you sure you’ve handled something like this before? We usually have someone more experienced take the lead.

choices.text: I’ve handled cable organization before. I’ll follow proper procedures.
choices.noteToPlayer: After the task: Pause, Advocate, and Privately Document what happened(date/time/what happened).

nodes.subtitle: Cable Cleanup Checklist (MVP): Step 1) Identify SAFE cables. Step 2) Group cables (data vs power). Step 3) Add labels to both ends.

nodes.speaker: Supervisor
nodes.subtitle: Give me a quick update. What did you do, and what’s next?

choices.text: I identified safe cables, grouped power and data separately, and labeled both ends. Next I’ll do a final check to make sure nothing is strained.
I cleaned it up. It should be good now.

nodes.subtitle: Scenario complete. Reflection: clear updates include (1) what you did, (2) current status, and (3) the next step. If you experienced bias, document it privately after.
